LightningComponentBundle.description: Configurable website footer component for Experience Cloud

property.name: maxWidth
property.label: Content Maximum Width
property.description: Maximum width of the footer content (e.g., 1280px, 100%)

property.name: overrideBackgroundColor
property.label: Override Theme Background Color
property.description: Check to use custom background color instead of theme color. When checked, specify your custom color in the Background Color setting.

property.name: backgroundColor
property.label: Background Color
property.description: Custom background color (only applies if override is checked)

property.name: overrideBottomBarColor
property.label: Override Theme Bottom Bar Color
property.description: Check to use custom bottom bar color instead of theme color. When checked, specify your custom color in the Bottom Bar Color setting.

property.name: bottomBarColor
property.label: Bottom Bar Color
property.description: Custom bottom bar color (only applies if override is checked)

property.name: overrideTextColor
property.label: Override Theme Text Color
property.description: Check to use custom text color instead of theme color. When checked, specify your custom color in the Text Color setting.

property.name: textColor
property.label: Text Color
property.description: Custom text color (only applies if override is checked)

property.name: copyrightText
property.default: Â© Copyright 2023 Salesforce | Connected University is not a real school. This is a demo site for Salesforce demo purposes only.
property.label: Copyright Text

property.name: footerMenuItems
property.label: Footer Navigation Menu
property.description: The name of the Navigation Menu Linkset for the main footer section. Note: While all navigation menus across sites are shown, only select a navigation menu that shows your site name in parentheses, as others will not work.

property.name: copyrightMenuItems
property.label: Copyright Navigation Menu
property.description: The name of the Navigation Menu Linkset for the copyright section. Note: While all navigation menus across sites are shown, only select a navigation menu that shows your site name in parentheses, as others will not work.

property.name: instagramUrl
property.label: Instagram URL
property.description: URL for the company Instagram profile

property.name: twitterUrl
property.label: Twitter URL
property.description: URL for the company Twitter profile

property.name: facebookUrl
property.label: Facebook URL
property.description: URL for the company Facebook profile

property.name: linkedinUrl
property.label: LinkedIn URL
property.description: URL for the company LinkedIn profile
